text: (Aey Nabi), In logon se kehdo ke “mujhey to un hastiyon ki ibadat se manah kardiya gaya hai jinhein tum Allah ko chodh kar pukarte ho. (main yeh kaam kaise kar sakta hoon) jabke mere paas mere Rubb ki taraf se bayyinat aa chuki hain. Mujhey hukum diya hai ke main Rubb ul aalameen ke aagey sar-e-tasleem kham kardun.”
